Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities

Class ShapeEntity<T extends javafx.scene.shape.Shape>

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.core.YaegerGameObject
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.YaegerEntity
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.ShapeEntity<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The Generic type to be used, which should extend Shape.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rotatable, Effectable, Anchorable, Bounded, DragRepositoryAccessor, EventInitiator, GameNode, Placeable, Removable, SceneChild, Initializable, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, TimerListProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
CenteredShapeEntity, RectangleEntity, TextEntity
public abstract class ShapeEntity<T extends javafx.scene.shape.Shape> extends YaegerEntity
The ShapeEntity is the abstract super class of all Entities that encapsulate a JavaFX Shape. The specific Shape to be used, should be set as the generic type, when this class is extended.
